ch0070_00_elitef/2701_1031_01_10:
Being an Ace Trainer
is lonely...
ch0070_00_elitef/2701_1031_02_10:
I miss the days of
being a rising star.
ch0070_00_elitef/2701_1031_03_10:
Dreaming of someday 
becoming a veteran...
ch0070_00_elitef/2701_0701_01_10:
I just love Pokémon.
That has always been the case.
ch0070_00_elitef/2701_0701_02_10:
Before I knew it,
people were calling me an Ace Trainer.
ch0070_00_elitef/2701_0701_03_10: Someday, people will call me a veteran.
ch0070_00_elitef/2701_0701_04_10:
But for me, I’ve always liked Pokémon
and that will never change.
ch0070_00_elitef/2701_0702_01_10:
I’m called an Ace Trainer, but
that doesn’t sit well with me.
ch0070_00_elitef/2701_0702_02_10: Can’t I simply be a Pokémon fan...?
ch0070_00_elitef/2702_1031_02_10:
I want a new Pokémon
pillow...
ch0070_00_elitef/2702_0701_01_10: A true Ace Trainer cares about sleep.
ch0070_00_elitef/2702_0701_02_10:
It’s important to restore the energy
that you burned up throughout the day.
ch0070_00_elitef/2702_0701_03_10:
What’s perfect for getting good sleep is using
a pillow of a cute Pokémon and Musharna 
as a protection against nightmares!
ch0070_00_elitef/2702_0702_02_10:
And it eats up all your bad dreams for you
so you can get a good night’s sleep.
ch0070_00_elitef/2703_1031_01_10:
The future is
beyond our imagination.
ch0070_00_elitef/2703_0701_01_10: My Xatu is always standing still.
ch0070_00_elitef/2703_0701_02_10:
It’s because she can’t avoid the future
even though she can see that it’s dark.
ch0070_00_elitef/2703_0701_03_10:
But I don’t believe that!
I promise I can change Xatu’s future!
ch0070_00_elitef/2703_0702_01_10:
Xatu can see not only the future
but also the past.
ch0070_00_elitef/2703_0702_02_10:
She knows how much effort I’ve put forth
in the past and how hard I’m working now.
She understands me the best!
ch0070_00_elitef/2704_1031_02_10:
I’m from a family of
Ace Trainers. Cool, right?
ch0070_00_elitef/2704_0701_01_10: My mom and my dad are both Ace Trainers!
ch0070_00_elitef/2704_0701_02_10: So imagine me becoming a punk girl!
ch0070_00_elitef/2704_0701_03_10:
They were like, “Whoa. Hold up. Say what?”
They got so jealous!
ch0070_00_elitef/2704_0702_01_10:
When I told them I’m going to be a punk girl,
my dad went to the mountains to find himself.
ch0070_00_elitef/2704_0702_02_10:
And my mom went to a beach wearing a bikini!
For real!
ch0070_00_elitef/2704_0702_03_10:
Once I was all alone, I thought maybe
being an Ace Trainer isn’t so bad.
ch0070_00_elitef/2751_1031_03_10:
I hope my Pokémon
can get stronger!
ch0070_00_elitef/2751_1032_01_10:
Aw, so cute...
Your Pokémon, that is!
ch0070_00_elitef/2751_1032_02_10:
The beauty of a pupa
before it emerges.
ch0070_00_elitef/2751_1032_03_10:
The potentiality before
Evolution is so beautiful.
ch0070_00_elitef/2751_0701_01_10:
When your Kakuna evolves,
he’ll be cool and strong!
ch0070_00_elitef/2751_0701_02_10: Really? Right now, I’m always protecting him...
ch0070_00_elitef/2751_0701_03_10:
He’ll turn into a Pokémon
that’s good at attacking.
But he’s cute now, too!
ch0070_00_elitef/2751_0701_04_10:
Yeah. But I’ll work hard so he can
evolve into a cool Pokémon soon!
ch0070_00_elitef/2751_0701_05_10:
No need to rush.
There’s always something good at every stage.
ch0070_00_elitef/2751_0701_06_10:
You can learn a lot by being creative
because your Pokémon hasn’t evolved yet.
It’s harder to do that after they evolve.
ch0070_00_elitef/2751_0701_07_10:
I see.
So you’re learning with your Ponyta...
ch0070_00_elitef/2861_1031_01_10:
I don’t want to be at the
center of attention...
ch0070_00_elitef/2861_0101_02_10:
Oh, that was just me warming up.
I’m not weird!
ch0070_00_elitef/2861_0101_03_10:
Umm...let’s battle!
If I win, promise me you won’t look at me
with those strange eyes.
ch0070_00_elitef/2861_0401_01_10: You seem more fired up than I am!
ch0070_00_elitef/2861_0102_01_10:
Ace Trainers are always confident!
Battling with force and spirit!
ch0070_00_elitef/2861_0501_01_10: You can’t just win by force.
ch0070_00_elitef/2861_0601_02_10:
My friend who knows I’m shy came up with it.
It’s quite embarrassing.
ch0070_00_elitef/2863_1031_01_10:
Keeps their focus and
always works hard...
ch0070_00_elitef/2863_1031_02_10:
And gives all they’ve got
in battles.
ch0070_00_elitef/2863_1031_03_10:
That’s the kind of Trainer
I want to battle against.
ch0070_00_elitef/2863_0101_02_10:
If you want to compete in the PML, you’ll have to
defeat me first!
ch0070_00_elitef/2863_0102_01_10:
If you want to get strong,
you must battle me.
ch0070_00_elitef/2863_0501_01_10:
What? I lost?
You must have trained really hard for this...
ch0070_00_elitef/2863_0601_01_10: I’m certain you’ll rise to the top in the PML.
ch0070_00_elitef/2863_0601_02_10: Keep your focus and continue to work hard!
